questionTitle: He was afraid of losing his suitcase so he tied a ________ on it on which he had written his name and address.
I am not sure, but ________ I know he has decided to accept the new job in London.
I enjoy working as his secretary, but he is such a perfectionist that it's ________.
You must ________ that your safety belt is fastened.
________, after trying three times, he passed the examination.
That was no accident: you did it on ________!
I was just ________ to go out when you telephoned.
The witness told the court that he ________ the accused before.
In order to ________ with his studies he worked through the summer.
The tea is very hot; you'll have to ________ it.
This car is in terrible condition - you ________ have an accident at any time.
I think you'd better ________ and see me next week.
He may be quick at understanding, but he is not capable ________ remembering anything.
He was found guilty ________ murder and condemned to death.
He is not only indifferent ________ other people; he is often extremely rude to them as well.
All people experience good as well as bad things ________.
I can't remember when all those books ________.
If we went there, we ________ some of the museums.
